name: Stickman Shooter: Cover Fire
description:
The terrorists have taken over! As an elite member of the E.S.A.T – The Elite Stickman Assault Team – you’ve been called in to strike back and eliminate the terrorists by any means necessary.

Using cover to your advantage, the aim of each map is to shoot and kill all the terrorists on each level. With 10 challenging missions to complete, you’ll have to put your aim and skill with a gun to the test if you want to complete them all!

Double tap on cover to run and get behind it, avoiding enemy fire. Switch between your revolver and combat assault rifle and use your finger to aim you gun at the enemy. Press the fire button to shoot your gun at the terrorists, kill them and strike back.

Use combat tactics & the available cover to make smart tactical decisions so you can stay alive. After all, what good is a dead E.S.A.T soldier? If your HP hits 0, you’re dead and you must start the level again, so stay alive!

----------------------------------------------------------
Stickman Shooter: Cover Fire – Highlights
----------------------------------------------------------
• 10 challenging tactical missions
• Shoot & kill the stickman terrorists on each mission to progress to the next
• Switch between a powerful revolver and elite combat assault rifle
• Use cover & combat tactics to your advantage to complete each mission
• Easy to understand controls so you can concentrate on the action!

With intense gun combat, tactical gameplay and enough missions to keep you entertained for hours, Stickman Shooter is the perfect game to kill time if you’re looking for an action packed shooting game on your mobile!
